Posts.Content: Oh he's a real "upper" and glass half empty type. I'd hate to meet him at a party, he'd soon get everyone crying. Medical people that deal with cancer are sure to get depressed as they see patient after patient, people that they know, die. The ones that get NED fade back into the population and resume their lives. So the medical people only see the hard tragic cases.
Posts.Title: Stage 4 long survival
